EmptyDollSlot.NAME: Empty Doll Slot
EmptyDollSlot.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: This is an empty Doll slot.
EmptyDollSlot.ACT_DESCRIPTION: I TOLD you this is just an empty Doll slot.

Su_san.NAME: Su-san
Su_san.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: #gPoison will trigger an additional time at the start of enemy turn.

ShanghaiDoll.NAME: Shanghai Doll
ShanghaiDoll.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: When #yPlaced, automatically #yActs once. Shanghai Doll's damage can be buffed by #yStrength.
ShanghaiDoll.ACT_DESCRIPTION: Deal %s damage to the enemy with lowest HP.

KyotoDoll.NAME: Kyoto doll
KyotoDoll.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever healed overflowed HP, deal equal amount of damage to ALL enemies.
KyotoDoll.ACT_DESCRIPTION: Heal half of current max HP.

NetherlandsDoll.NAME: Dutch Doll
NetherlandsDoll.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Provides %s Strength and %s Dexterity for Alice. When #yPlacing other Dutch Dolls, let this #yAct #b2 times #rinstead .
NetherlandsDoll.ACT_DESCRIPTION: Alternately increase the amount of Strength or Dexterity in Passive by #b1 .

FranceDoll.NAME: French Doll
FranceDoll.PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, set Block of this equal to Alice.
FranceDoll.ACT_DESCRIPTION: Move to a slot which can't bear enemies' damage, then gain %s Block. NL Will not move to a slot already containing a French Doll.
